review_title: Best hospital in Hyderabad for children's
pros: The best hospital in the town
cons: Not bad in good patient services..

pros: Very less. Work life balance is average. No future in working there. Only got 20% increment in 7 years. If you are a Muslim then you can get some opportunities.
cons:
Management changes frequently. Discrimination against Hindus.  Salary benefits only to Union employees. No PF, No gratuity, no increments for non-union Hindus. As it is a  Muslim management there is restriction for the Muslims employees.
When I resigned for lack of increments they did not relieve me nor given any increment for 1 year. I had to forcefully get my self relieved from the hospital.

pros: I like working here Learn, work and grow
cons: Better opportunities prospects where I see less scope of opportunities
